steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project_executions --> navigate to Page_executions
step 4: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_requirements --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-design_requirement-test-run-coverage
step 5: At Page_test-reports_test-design_requirement-test-run-coverage click on hyperlink_test_cases --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active

step 6: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on hyperlink_test_cases_data_driven_samples_data_bind --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-cases-data-binding-order-and-check-out-multiple-products
